Craftsman Style Fence

The craftsman style fence features an alternating board pattern with 5' and 6' fence boards, creating 12" gaps for wind flow and visibility. Built with 3 rails, 3 trim, and a top cap in #1 grade cedar for a unique architectural look with Fence Genius precision.

Unique Pattern
Wind Flow
Fence Genius Precision
Distinctive Craftsman Design
The alternating board pattern creates a unique visual appeal while providing wind flow and enhanced visibility.

Why homeowners choose craftsman style

  • Alternating 5' and 6' board pattern creates distinctive craftsman aesthetic.
  • 12" gaps allow wind to pass through, reducing fence stress in storms.
  • Enhanced visibility while maintaining substantial privacy.
  • Strong 3-rail structure with matching trim and top cap.
  • Cedar construction excels in the Pacific Northwest climate.
  • Fence Genius planning delivers precise measurements and clean lines.

How we build craftsman style fence (our standard)

  • Three 2x4 rails, screwed directly into the posts for maximum strength.
  • Alternating board pattern: 5' and 6' fence boards creating 12" wind gaps.
  • Three trim boards that frame each panel to complement the rail structure.
  • Top 2x4 cap for a finished, architectural profile.
  • Standard posts: 4.125" x 4.125" x 9' set approximately 2' deep with ~180 lbs of properly mixed concrete.
  • Stainless steel fasteners standard to prevent corrosion and black streaking.

Pricing is available in our Virtual Quote Tool with your exact measurements.

Fence Genius planning for craftsman designs

  • Set new posts first to establish a stable baseline for the alternating pattern.
  • Capture post-to-post measurements and calculate optimal board placement.
  • Plan alternating board heights to maintain consistent 12" gaps.
  • Panels are optimized to follow the ground at both top and bottom for clean lines.

Key specs

SpecStandard
Posts4.125" x 4.125" x 9' set approximately 2' deep with ~180 lbs properly mixed concrete
RailsThree 2x4 rails, screwed directly into posts
Board PatternAlternating 5' and 6' fence boards with 12" wind gaps
Pickets#1 grade cedar (clear cedar upgrade available)
Cap/TrimTop 2x4 cap; three trim boards to complement rail structure
FastenersStainless fasteners to prevent corrosion/black streaking
GatesMatching single/double gates; heavy-duty hardware
HeightsAvailable: 4', 5', 6', 8' (alternating pattern maintained)

Options & upgrades

Rot board for added durability at grade
Custom gap spacing for different wind requirements
4" exterior screws for superior hold
6x6 post upgrades
Steel core post-on-pipe systems
2 foot lattice topper for 8 foot height
Decorative post caps and trim variants
Professional stain and seal options

Gates & hardware

Craftsman Style Fence FAQs

How does the alternating pattern affect strength?

The 3-rail structure maintains excellent strength while the alternating pattern actually reduces wind load, making it more storm-resistant.

Can I adjust the gap size?

Yes, we can customize the board heights to create different gap sizes based on your privacy and wind flow preferences.

How do I see cost?

About Craftsman Style Fencing

Unique Alternating Board Pattern

The craftsman style fence features a distinctive alternating board pattern with 5' and 6' fence boards, creating 12" gaps that allow wind to flow through while maintaining substantial privacy.

Built with the same premium cedar frame construction as our popular Picture Frame Fence, but with added architectural interest.
